name: Why Is It So Hard to Get Up?
name_original: Why Is It So Hard to Get Up?
description:
Liluo
https://liluo.io/games/c82f2b32-47e7-40d4-8ce4-133ab5add800

Hello!
Welcome to my game "Why Is It So Hard to Get Up?"
To be honest I had way bigger plans for this but it ended
up really bad since I had problems with the engine
crashing and I couldn't get help quickly on the forum,
I had to redo everything in the last day and I'm tired,
I have to sleep, hopefully you can enjoy the music at least!

Lyrics of the Song "Why is it so hard to get up?"
Composed, written and performed by Grony
All I see is my dreams away from me
Why could it be?
What could it mean?
Am I maybe not meant for this?
Am I just lying while I believe?
I just don't understand
How it gets tougher everyday
How it gets harder everytime
You're not here to stay
Or am I just weak?
Am I the wrong me?
Since I don't know how to behave
When you're near to my soul
'Cause I don't know where I am
I feel so lost
Is this even my world?

If anyone's interested in the sheet music;
send a message!

Software Used
LMMS for digital songs & sounds
TuxGuitar for arranging
Sketchbook for art
GDevelop for coding
Windows Voice Recorder
